mouseover_blocker.comment: blocks mouse detection for bottom 2 px rows to prevent mouseon/off anim glitch

recruitment_cost_holder.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to train this character.

component_text.text: Before a Kislev spellcaster can be recruited they must be sent to the Ice Court for training. Here each candidate will have the opportunity to acquire a number of character traits.
